Questions: 如何将虚拟机规模集加入到 Azure AD 域？
Answer: 要将虚拟机规模集加入到 Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) 域，可以定义一个扩展。 若要定义扩展，请使用 JsonADDomainExtension 属性："extensionProfile": { "extensions": [ { "name": "joindomain", "properties": { "publisher": "Microsoft.Compute", "type": "JsonADDomainExtension", "typeHandlerVersion": "1.3", "settings": { "Name": "[parameters('domainName')]", "OUPath": "[variables('ouPath')]", "User": "[variables('domainAndUsername')]", "Restart": "true", "Options": "[variables('domainJoinOptions')]" }, "protectedsettings": { "Password": "[parameters('domainJoinPassword')]" } } } ] } \n
